meanings.definition: A person who engages in light-hearted teasing or joking with others.
meanings.sent1: The group of banterers at the party kept everyone laughing.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the banterers in our office; they always make the day more fun.
meanings.sent3: The banterers in the comedy club had the audience in stitches.
meanings.sent4: Among the banterers, she was the queen of wit and humor.
meanings.sent5: The banterers in the schoolyard were like a comedy show come to life.

meanings.definition: The act of engaging in playful and witty conversation with others.
meanings.sent1: Their banterers during the game added to the friendly atmosphere.
meanings.sent2: The banterers between friends made the evening enjoyable.
meanings.sent3: The banterers in the play were cleverly written and well-received.
meanings.sent4: The banterers flowed effortlessly, creating a lively discussion.
meanings.sent5: The banterers in the book were so engaging, I couldn't put it down.
